  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.data.BackgroundWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BackgroundWorker
extends java.lang.Thread
    cz.zcu.kiv.multiclouddesktop.data/BackgroundWorker.java

    Background worker for using the MultiCloud library properly.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

               FileInfo destination,
               java.lang.String destinationName,
               ProgressDialog progressDialog)
        Preparing task for file transfer between accounts.
        Parameters:
        srcAccount - Source account name.
        source - Source file to be transferred.
        threads - Number of download threads.
        move - If the source file should be moved.

        destination - Destination file to be updated.
        destinationName - New file name.
        progressDialog - Progress dialog.
        Returns:
        If the task was initialized.

                       throws MultiCloudException,
                              OAuth2SettingsException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException

        MultiCloudException - If the operation failed.
